publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6141 John Park: Team up to Beat Cancer—That the Parliament applauds the ongoing work of Cancer Research UK in Scotland and the thousands of people across Scotland who get involved in and support the Cancer Research UK Relay for Life; celebrates the spirit and commitment of relay teams across Scotland who took part in the 2009 relay, which raised a staggering £522,986 for cancer research in Scotland; notes that Cancer Research UK hopes that the Relay for Life will raise even more in 2010; recognises that, while the number of people surviving cancer has been increasing over the last few decades, one in three people will be diagnosed with cancer and that cancer causes one in four deaths in the UK; acknowledges the great need for everyone to keep fighting cancer together; welcomes the Relay for Life event, which it considers to be a unique celebration of life and hope that unites communities to help beat cancer; joins Cancer Research UK in its battle against cancer, and urges people across Scotland to help save lives by getting involved in a Relay for Life in their own community in 2010.

S3M-6141 Team up to Beat Cancer (lodged on 13 April 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Mike Pringle*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Hugh Henry*, Jackson Carlaw*, David Whitton*, Johann Lamont*, Ian McKee*, Bill Butler*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jackie Baillie*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-6141 Team up to Beat Cancer (lodged on 13 April 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Sarah Boyack*, Jack McConnell*, Trish Godman*
